title: Concurrent Goroutines in Golang
description: This challenge is designed to test your understanding of goroutines in Golang. Goroutines are lightweight threads of execution that allow for concurrent execution of functions.

meta.title: Mastering Goroutines in Golang | Concurrent Programming
meta.description: Explore the power of goroutines in Golang, learn to create and run concurrent functions, and discover the advantages of this lightweight thread of execution.
meta.keywords: Golang, Goroutines, Concurrent Programming, Lightweight Threads, Asynchronous Execution

verify.name: Verify Concurrent Goroutines Output Interleaving
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
